meanings.definition: A removable insert placed inside a shoe for added comfort or support.
meanings.sent1: I bought new insoles for my shoes to make them more comfortable.
meanings.sent2: She decided to get gel insoles for her sneakers.
meanings.sent3: The insoles in my shoes are like tiny cushions for my feet.
meanings.sent4: His insoles were like little pillows hugging his feet.
meanings.sent5: Walking on clouds, thanks to my soft insoles!

meanings.definition: The inner sole of a shoe.
meanings.sent1: The insoles of my shoes were worn out from all the walking.
meanings.sent2: He noticed a hole in the insoles of his favorite boots.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally stepped on gum, and now it's stuck to my insoles!
meanings.sent4: The insoles of her shoes were like the secret keepers of her adventures.
meanings.sent5: The insoles whispered stories of every step taken.
